Role: Moulton College (2007â€“2009)

Jof Davies designed and implemented a Transport Management System using Access and VBA. The system supported hundreds of students and included route management, passenger lists, scheduling automation, and printable manifests. Jof also created mapping software to visualise routes and student distribution.

He replaced complex Excel-based budgeting and invoicing sheets with structured, automated processes, reducing manual errors and improving operational clarity. This represented his first major systems engineering role, demonstrating database design, automation logic, and process optimisation capabilities.
